text:
@realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP Instead of spread the love...it is spread the virus.

Talk about low IQ.  @POTUS still in denial regarding Covid19.

He really doesn't care about anyone but himself.
#traitorinthewhitehouse #TraitorTrump
